boardgame.name: City of Horror
殭屍城
boardgame.description: City of Horror is a backstabbing survival-horror game. As in classic zombie movies, a shambling horde is invading the city. The goal is to survive the assault. (Un)fortunately, surviving often means sacrificing some of your fellow players to the undead..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player controls several characters with different abilities; these characters can move to various limited-capacity locations, which they can then barricade and scavenge for items and weapons. Critical situations, such as zombies breaking in and eating a character, are resolved using a vote._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The basic game mechanisms are the same as in Mall of Horror (also designed by Nicolas Normandon), but City of Horror differs in both materials and game play in a number of ways: the city map changes each game, twenty characters are included, they can use antidotes (or die), action cards become scarce as the game goes on, you can gain points with stuff other than surviving characters..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Asmodee (ASMCOHMU01) In City of Horror, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re playing a group of humans faced with a zombie invasion. The struggle against the dead is important, but your own survival is vital! To win, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have to make alliances but also betray your companions. A game is played over 4 turns. Each turn represents one hour of time before reinforcements arrive. These turns are played out similarly: zombies arrive, players move one of their characters and then each location is resolved (power and attack). At the end of the 4 turns of play, the player with the most victory points (characters, food and antidote) wins the game. But be careful: to get into the helicopter, the players will have to make sure each of their living characters has been vaccinated.
English
3-6 players (Asmodee) With Free Promo Card Languages: English

At the end of the 4 turns of play, the player with the most victory points (characters, food and antidote) wins the game. But be careful: to get into the helicopter, the players will have to make sure each of their living characters has been vaccinated.

New in shrink wrap. Canadians will be charge applicable taxes. Orders will be processed the same day and shipped by expedited parcel. You will be charged exact shipping plus $2 for packing material. Shipped from N2B 1J4. We ship worldwide. Orders may be combined and orders over $150 will be shipped in Canada free or in the US for a $10 flat fee. Orders must be placed at the same time (within 20 min of each other to receive combined shipping or we may have already shipped the first part of the order). We will reduce shipping cost on international orders by $10 if the order is over $150. We currently only accept PayPal. Our prices are always 30% or more off US MRSP.

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 2 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: PayPal SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. All orders are shipping Priority Mail. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 3 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange within 3 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

Played twice. Game is complete, but only English instructions will be included. Stored in non-smoking home. Lawn Mower Promo Card included. Some game boards feature a bit of warping. This problem has been wide spread and is discussed in this BGG thread: http://boardgamegeek.com/thread/875195/warped-board-tiles The issue does not affect game play. Please see the pictures included in this listing. Item will be sent USPS. Buyer agrees to pay actual shipping and packaging costs, including tracking and insurance if desired. Shipping cost to be determined after sale. As an estimate - the game does fit into a medium sized flat rate box, which costs $12.95 and includes tracking and insurance. [b]Shipping Options:[/b] I will check all three of USPS, UPS, and FedEx to find the cheapest option. Experience has made it clear that there is no one-size fits all shipping solution and each carrier has different favorable price points depending on weight, dimensions, and distance. Not all options will be available, but may include: USPS Priority (East Coast) USPS Retail Ground (Midwest and West Coast) USPS Regional Rate (If your order fits the standardized box) USPS First Class (Under 13 oz) UPS Ground FedEx Home FedEx Ground (commercial addresses only)
